core_meaning: Sextile between Uranus and Sun opens opportunity/skill. Uranus: . Sun: ego, identity, authority, vitality, purpose, visibility. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Authority, recognition, leadership, alignment with purpose. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Self-respect, healthy boundaries, paternal figures. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Status-linked income, government/authority-linked gains. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Heart, vitality, heat regulation; consider circadian rhythm. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Uranus Sextile Sun

hi.title: Uranus Sextile Sun (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Uranus और Sun का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
